Reviews.Title: Balkin Adapters
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: The items arrived in short order and were put to use.  Installed the adapters with very little difficulty. They worked fine and are still working great

ProductInfo.Features:
4pcs=2 pair; mini BNC Video Balun Per package
1 Channel Passive Video balun. - No power required
Full-motion CCTV Video at distances up to 1000ft(305m).
Outstanding interference rejection and transient protection
Male BNC allows connection directly to the camera or DVR
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech Video Balun - 2 Pairs(4 Pcs) Mini Cctv BNC Video Balun - UTP Video Transceiver Mini Cctv BNC Video Balun. Support All Video Device, Such As Security Cameras, Monitor, DVR Card and Recorder Etc.
